title: Victoria to cut 1,000 public service jobs
description: The job cuts come after top bureaucrat Helen Silver was given the task of streamlining Victoria's public service.
content:
More than 1,000 public service jobs will be slashed under a cost-cutting plan intended to save billions of dollars unveiled by the Victorian Government.
Treasurer Jaclyn Symes today publicly release… [+2729 chars]
